WIP
I have 5+ years of experience designing, coding, and simulating autonomous micro aerial vehicles. During my study and research, I developed a great interest in perception-related tasks and algorithms, as well as data-driven and learning-based methods of solving practical problems. Now, my main interests are 3D vision/SLAM/VIO, ML/AI, and image/video processing. Click me to download my CV.
Experience Master’s Student in Aerospace Engineering Delft University of Technology · Full-time Sep 2022 - Present Delft, South Holland, Netherlands
Program profile: Control and Simulation

Project video demo: Omnihex
Click me for more information I made a drone that can hover at any orientation:
Released a PX4-Autopilot firmware optimized for over-actuated hexacopters by reworking the flight control algorithm, flight mode manager, and control allocation algorithm Created a digital twin of our hexacopter (in SDFormat) and wrote ROS2 plugins for doing software-in-the-loop Gazebo simulation Built an over-actuated hexacopter from scratch using the Solidworks software, 3D printing and CNC machining technics Implemented ROS2-PX4 wrappers for Dynamixel servos and the OptiTrack indoor motion-capturing system My work has also been used as a basic building component in 2 other lab projects researching trajectory planning of over-actuated drones
